ygData.subject: Re: everquest dating for single gamers!
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright. His choice of wording wasn t particularly grand. But please, this world is full of people that hate and then people that hate people that hate. Hatred
ygData.messageBody:
Alright. His choice of wording wasn't
particularly grand. But please, this world is full of people
that hate and then people that hate people that hate.
Hatred is hatred and your reaction isn't helping. It's
making it worse. <br><br>Calling someone a bigot for a
prejudice is to not understand the nature of prejudice. I'm
not saying he's right, or your wrong. I'm saying that
the labels are far too convenient.<br><br>If someone
wants an alternative life style club, then they go
ahead and join that club instead of his
club.<br><br>Prejudice doesn't mean evil. It means a bias towards
something (non-dictionary-- off the top of my
head).<br><br>This club is prejudice. We exclude people that have
nothing to do with Everquest and they are not supposed to
post to this list. If everyone started talking UO or
Anarchy Online, I might just stop checking the lists.
<br><br>And before anyone argues that that isn't prejudice--
by legal symantics that is prejudice. As far as I
know that is. I was an apartment manager and a lawyer
told us in a training session that prejudice depends
on what you're prejudice against. The law classifies
our eviction of non-paying tenants as prejudice
against people that cannot pay rent. The law is on our
side there. But we cannot say, show prejudice against
non-firemen and give firemen preferencial treatment just
because we think that will make our building safer. That
is illegal.<br><br>I probably should have waited for
the 24 hour rule. No responds to posts before then.
But I thought, eh... I'm not really angry. I am
fustrated and afraid. But only because I see fear breeding
fear and anger breeding anger... and fustration
overwashing, tinting, tainting.<br><br>I'm no knight, no
philosopher. I am shooman. I am Fatedhue Prismatic. Thanks for
reading.<br><br>shooman out... I am nothing-- for lack of something.
